MODULE_SHIPPING_USPS_TEXT_DESCRIPTION:
United States Postal Service

You will need to have registered an account with USPS at https://secure.shippingapis.com/registration/ to use this module

USPS expects you to use pounds as weight measure for your products.
MODULE_SHIPPING_USPS_TEXT_ERROR:
An error occured with the USPS shipping calculations.
If you would like to use USPS as your shipping method, please contact the store owner.
MODULE_SHIPPING_USPS_TEXT_CONNECTION_ERR: Failed to connect to the USPS Web Tools™ postage rates server.
MODULE_SHIPPING_USPS_ERROR_NO_SERVICES:
No allowed USPS services could be used to ship this package.
If you would like to use USPS as your shipping method, please contact the store owner.
